ComicInfo.Summary: Seven variant covers exist for this issue: Regular; Regular (blood red foil); Regular (platinum foil); Vicious; Auxiliary; Blood Lust; Wrap.From the time before history began, from the time when the continents were still connected by land, from the harsh climes at the top of the world, a Northish soldier wrapped in a cape of wolf pelts walks south into the forests of the High Midlands that are now Europe. He finds a village cut in two by travelers from the East. Soon, he too is torn - between duty to the lives he has ruined just by finding them, and duty to the hideous murder-god of the Northish wastes and the berserker drugs that are his sacrament.
